title: Matte Finish Business Cards - TechStart Inc.
description: Premium 300 GSM stock with matte finish. Custom-designed business cards for a tech startup with embossed logo. Delivered 5,000 units.

title: Large Format Flex Banner - XYZ Company
description: Eye-catching outdoor advertising banner. 18ft x 6ft vinyl flex banner with vibrant colors and weather-resistant finish. Perfect for storefront visibility.

title: Custom Printed T-Shirts - Marathon Event
description: High-quality DTG printing on premium 100% cotton t-shirts. Event-branded shirts with custom graphics. 500 pieces produced.

title: Vinyl Stickers & Labels - Eco Brand
description: Waterproof vinyl stickers with UV-resistant printing. Custom brand labels for product packaging with holographic finish. 10,000 units.

title: Event Foam Board Display - Annual Conference
description: Lightweight foam core boards with full-color graphics. Professional exhibition display for corporate conference. 6 large format boards.

title: Corporate Stationery Set - Law Firm
description: Complete stationery package including letterheads, envelopes, and business cards. Premium finish with gold foil accents. Professional branding suite.

title: Custom Hoodie Print - Sports Team
description: Screen printing on premium fleece hoodies. Team logos and player names. 200 pieces for annual sports day.

title: Product Label Design - Food Packaging
description: High-gloss labels with vibrant brand colors. Custom shapes and sizes. Perfect for food and beverage products. 50,000 roll labels.

title: Trade Show Retractable Banner
description: Professional retractable banner stand with custom graphics. 33x80 inch display with aluminum frame. Perfect for exhibitions.
